title: A vvord in season: or, Now or never. Tis ne'r too late to be advised well regard it then you beauties that excel both in external and internal parts and do not triumph over captive hearts: least you ingrateful being left to time bereft of charmes, be punisht that black crime. A pleasant new tune, of Sweet use your time, &c.
author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for J. Wright, J. Clark, W. Thackery, and T. Pass[i]nger.,
